item.title: Analyse and optimize a webpack vuejs bundle
item.description: At around 450 kb of javascript code, a Quasar distribution bundle seems a bit too big. The following short recipe applies to an app generated from the Quasar Framework default template, but it probably applies to any vuejs project that uses vue-loader, and even any project using webpack. First, we want to analyse what’s inside the bundle. A good utility is webpack-bundle-analyzer, but how to use it? Configure the webpack to write the stats to a json file.
